title: Remove footer branding text while preserving layout

requirements.summary: Remove the visible footer branding text from the selected footer element while keeping footer and app layout unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The text “© 2026. Built with using caffeine.ai” is no longer visible anywhere in the footer.
No other footer styles change (padding, borders, background, positioning remain consistent).
No changes occur to the rest of the app’s layout or functionality (no new spacing shifts, no broken links/buttons, no runtime errors).

file_operations.description: Update only the content within the selected footer element (the inner div that currently renders the branding text) to ensure “© 2026. Built with using caffeine.ai” is not visible. Preserve the existing footer container structure and spacing by keeping the element in place (e.g., render a non-visible placeholder within the same div so height/spacing remain unchanged) and ensure no interactive/footer behavior elsewhere is impacted.
